verses.verse: Then the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves at Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> and set <S%H7931><s%> up the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> was subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And there remained <S%H3498><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had not divided <S%H2505><s%> their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "How <S%H575><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will you put <S%H7503><s%> off <S%H7503><s%> entering <S%H935><s%> to take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, has given <S%H1><s%> you?

"Provide <S%H3051><s%> for yourselves three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> from each tribe <S%H7626><s%> that I may send <S%H7971><s%> them, and that they may arise <S%H6965><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> a description of it according <S%H6310><s%> to their inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> then they shall return <S%H935><s%> to me.

"And they shall divide <S%H2505><s%> it into seven <S%H7651><s%> portions; <S%H2506><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall stay <S%H5975><s%> in its territory <S%H1366><s%> on the south, <S%H5045><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall stay <S%H5975><s%> in their territory <S%H1366><s%> on the north. <S%H6828><s%>

"And you shall describe <S%H3789><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> in seven <S%H7651><s%> divisions, <S%H2506><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> [the description] here <S%H2008><s%> to me. And I will cast <S%H3384><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here <S%H6311><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

"For the Levites <S%H3881><s%> have <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> portion <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you, because <S%H3588><s%> the priesthood <S%H3550><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%> and Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the half-tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> also have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them."

Then the men <S%H376><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and went, <S%H1980><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> those who went <S%H1980><s%> to describe <S%H3789><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> and describe <S%H3789><s%> it, and return <S%H7725><s%> to me; then I will cast <S%H7993><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here <S%H6311><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in Shiloh. <S%H7887><s%>"

So the men <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and described <S%H3789><s%> it by cities <S%H5892><s%> in seven <S%H7651><s%> divisions <S%H2506><s%> in a book; <S%H5612><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Shiloh. <S%H7887><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for them in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions. <S%H4256><s%>

Now the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> and the territory <S%H1366><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> lay <S%H3318><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

And their border <S%H1366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> was from the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> then the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the north, <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up through the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> westward; <S%H3220><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Beth-aven.

And from there <S%H8033><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> continued <S%H5674><s%> to Luz, <S%H3870><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Luz <S%H3870><s%> (that is, Bethel <S%H1008><s%>) southward; <S%H5045><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Ataroth-addar, near <S%H5921><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [lies] on the south <S%H5045><s%> of lower <S%H8481><s%> Beth-horon.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> extended <S%H9638><s%> [from there,] and turned <S%H5437><s%> round <S%H5437><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward, <S%H5045><s%> from the hill <S%H2022><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [lies] before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Beth-horon southward; <S%H5045><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), a city <S%H5892><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the west <S%H3220><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

Then the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> [was] from the edge <S%H7097><s%> of Kiriath-jearim, and the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> to the fountain <S%H4599><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah. <S%H5318><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Ben-hinnom, <S%H2011><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> northward; <S%H6828><s%> and it went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom, to the slope <S%H3802><s%> of the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> southward, <S%H5045><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to En-rogel.

And it extended <S%H9638><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> to En-shemesh and went <S%H3318><s%> to Geliloth, <S%H1553><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is opposite <S%H5227><s%> the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Adummim, <S%H131><s%> and it went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben. <S%H7205><s%>

And it continued <S%H5674><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> in front <S%H4136><s%> of the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the Arabah. <S%H6160><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> continued <S%H5674><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Beth-hoglah northward; <S%H6828><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the north <S%H6828><s%> bay <S%H3956><s%> of the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> at the south <S%H5045><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the south <S%H5045><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>

Moreover, the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> was its border <S%H1379><s%> on the east <S%H9506><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> [and] according to its borders <S%H1367><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around. <S%H5439><s%>

Now the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and Beth-hoglah and Emek-keziz,
and Beth-arabah and Zemaraim <S%H6787><s%> and Bethel, <S%H1008><s%>
and Avvim <S%H5761><s%> and Parah <S%H6511><s%> and Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%>
and Chephar-ammoni and Ophni <S%H6078><s%> and Geba; <S%H1387><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> and Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Beeroth, <S%H881><s%>
and Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> and Chephirah <S%H3716><s%> and Mozah, <S%H4681><s%>
and Rekem <S%H7552><s%> and Irpeel <S%H3416><s%> and Taralah, <S%H8634><s%>

and Zelah, <S%H6762><s%> Haeleph <S%H507><s%> and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> (that is, Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>), Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> Kiriath; <S%H7157><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
